DRAW_SVG

src/seismographconfig.js

Constant for drawing seismogram using svg.

DRAW_SVG

Type: string

DRAW_CANVAS

src/seismographconfig.js

Constant for drawing seismogram using canvas, axies are still svg.

DRAW_CANVAS

Type: string

DRAW_BOTH

src/seismographconfig.js

Constant for drawing seismogram using both canvas and svg, for testing.

DRAW_BOTH

Type: string

DRAW_BOTH_ALIGN

src/seismographconfig.js

Constant for drawing seismogram using both canvas and svg plus alignment markers, for testing.

DRAW_BOTH_ALIGN

Type: string

src/seismographconfig.js

â–¸ title
src/seismographconfig.js

gets the current title

title

Type: Array<string>

Returns
Array<string>: title as an array of strings
â–¸ title
src/seismographconfig.js

Sets the title as simple string or array of strings. If an array then each item will be in a separate tspan for easier formatting.

title

Type: (string | Array<string>)

Parameters
value ((string | Array<string>)) string or array of strings to be the title
â–¸ createAlignmentData(timeWindow, min, max)
src/seismographconfig.js

Fake data to use to test alignment of seismograph axis and between canvas and svg drawing.

createAlignmentData(timeWindow: StartEndDuration, min: number, max: number): SeismogramDisplayData
Parameters
timeWindow (StartEndDuration) start and end of fake data
min (number = -100) min amplitude for fake data, default is -100
max (number = 100) max amplitude for fake data, default is 100
Returns
SeismogramDisplayData: fake data
